definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: catch, seize (Ar. xat.ifa; cf. As. taḫṭîpu, oppression, Dl:Pr 181; NH [[חָטַף]], Aram. h.t.ap seize, [[חֲטַף]] do hurriedly)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וַחֲטַפְתֶּם]] consec. Ju Jdg 21:21 lit., seize wives; Impf. [[יַחֲטׂף עָנִי]] Ps 10:9; Inf. [[לַחֲטוֹף עָנִי]] Ps 10:9 both fig. of oppressor catching the distressed; all sq. acc.
